list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an opaque white fluid rich in fat and protein, secreted by female mammals for the nourishment of their young.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a healthy mother will produce enough milk for her baby
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một người mẹ khỏe mạnh sẽ sản xuất đủ sữa cho bé

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: draw milk from (a cow or other animal), either by hand or mechanically.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: two hours later he was up again to milk the cows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hai giờ sau anh lại thức ăn sữa bò

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: exploit or defraud (someone), typically by taking regular small amounts of money over a period of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he had milked his grandmother dry of all her money
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta đã vắt sữa cho bà ngoại khô hết tiền của mình
